name: JOJO'S BIZARRE ADVENTURE - BATTLE RUSH
description:
A game made in a couple days for the Indigestible Game Jam. where the goal was to make a game based on a very specific reference. I recently got into JoJo's Bizarre Adventure and was feeling inspired and decided to make this game. Its pretty simple but its good fun. Punch buttons are by default:
Jotaro - S
DIO - K
These are both configurable to any input in the launcher (Was tested with Fight Sticks, its good fun.

Linux build coming shortly.

LEGAL FUN:

The Following is a fan-based game.

JoJo's Bizarre Adventure and Stardust Crusaders are both owned by Viz Media, Shueisha, and Hirohiko Araki.

All sprite assets in this game were created by Capcom for the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure fighting game, and credit belongs to them.

Please support the official release
